dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Lee Kun-hee at the top of the list with a net worth of 17.4 billion dollars.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Lee Kun-hee at the top of the list with a net worth of seventeen point four billion dollars.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: #1 Lee Kun-hee $17.3 B 78 Samsung, Samsung Electronics

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Wow, and he's 78, still leading Samsung—that's just massive.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wow, and he's seventy eight, still leading Samsung-that's just massive.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: #1 Lee Kun-hee $17.3 B 78 Samsung, Samsung Electronics

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and look, Seo Jung-jin in second place with 11.5 billion from biotech and Celltrion.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and look, Seo Jung-jin in second place with eleven point five billion from biotech and Celltrion.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Biotech's really climbing, huh? That's a huge jump from traditional industries.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Biotech's really climbing, huh? That's a huge jump from traditional industries.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. And then you've got Kim Jung-ju from Nexon—online games pulling in almost 10 billion.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. And then you've got Kim Jung-ju from Nexon-online games pulling in almost ten billion.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: #3 Kim Jung-ju $9.6 B 52 online games, Nexon

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: It's interesting how many are from tech and gaming, like Kakao and Smilegate further down.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's interesting how many are from tech and gaming, like Kakao and Smilegate further down.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: #5 Kim Beom-su $5.2 B 54 online services, Kakao #6 Kwon Hyuk-bin $4 B 46 online games, Smilegate Holdings

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Right? And Jay Y. Lee, also Samsung, at number four with 6.7 billion.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right? And Jay Y. Lee, also Samsung, at number four with six point seven billion.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: #4 Jay Y. Lee $6.7 B 52 Samsung, Samsung Electronics

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: The family's just everywhere on this list, honestly.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The family's just everywhere on this list, honestly.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. And Hyundai's there too—Mong-Koo Chung and Euisun Chung both representing.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. And Hyundai's there too-Mong-Koo Chung and Euisun Chung both representing.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: #8 Mong-Koo Chung $3.2 B 82 Hyundai, Hyundai Motor #11 Euisun Chung $1.95 B 49 Hyundai, Hyundai Motor

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: You know what surprised me? Bom Kim from Coupang, online retail, just hitting that billion mark.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: You know what surprised me? Bom Kim from Coupang, online retail, just hitting that billion mark.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: #31 Bom Kim $1 B 41 online retailing, Coupang

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: At only 41, that's impressive. Coupang's really taken off.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: At only forty one, that's impressive. Coupang's really taken off.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: #31 Bom Kim $1 B 41 online retailing, Coupang

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And so many new names compared to, like, even five years ago.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And so many new names compared to, like, even five years ago.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Definitely shows where the economy's shifting.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Definitely shows where the economy's shifting.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Still, gotta respect the classics—cosmetics, construction, they're holding their own.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Still, gotta respect the classics-cosmetics, construction, they're holding their own.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: True, Amorepacific's Suh Kyung-bae is up there too.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: True, Amorepacific's Suh Kyung-bae is up there too.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Overall though, it feels like a real mix of old money and new innovators.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Overall though, it feels like a real mix of old money and new innovators.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, South Korea's wealth landscape is diversifying big time.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, South Korea's wealth landscape is diversifying big time.
